channel.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
channel.description:
Hello I've been looking for a working 508 compiler i've download 508 servers & clients for there compilers but they don't seem to work anything 377 and under will compile. Here are the compiler codes I have at the moment.
Source: [code]@echo off Title a compiler cd .. color 0c "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause[/code]
Client: [code]@echo off color 0c "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“pobdol, post:10, topic:379805”]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac
So I just add this?[/quote]No just add:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\;

To the end of your PATH then this is what you will use to compile:

@echo off
cd ..
javac -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

kinda.
make your compiler look like this

@echo off
TITLE Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

if your files are in a different folder, like java files would be in src folder, if thats the case then

@echo off
TITLE Compiler
cd src
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You need to include the path to javac in your PATH variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

This is my CLASSPTH:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

This is my PATH:

C:\Windows\System32\;C:\Windows\;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus\Microsoft.VC90.CRT;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus\Microsoft.VC90.MFC;

I’m able to compile 317’s and stuff but the moment I step up and try to compile I get an error.

Read full topic

item.title: Working 508 Compiler Needed
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

It can’t find your javac executable, add the JDK bin directory into your PATH system variable.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:379805”]Can you tell me what it says? It’s most likely a directory issue.

@echo off color 0c "DIR TO JAVA HERE" ./files/*.java pause [/quote]

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
